To cite lassie methods in publication:

Hraber P, Korber B, Wagh K, Giorgi EE, Bhattacharya T, et
al. Longitudinal antigenic sequences and sites from intra-host
evolution (LASSIE) identifies immune-selected HIV variants. Viruses,
7(10): 5443-5475, 2015.

If you use the included sequence data in publication, please cite

Liao et al., 2013 (http://ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23552890) and Gao et al.,
2014 (http://ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25065977).  

Thank you.
